name: OGOPOGO
description:
OGOPOGO is a game about searching for lake monsters by making palindromes. Try to beat your high score and complete 20 challenging achievements as you plumb the depths of this curious new puzzle mechanic.

Designed and developed by Chris Klimowski. Follow @csklimowski for updates. 

If you experience performance issues, try using Chrome (I know, I know) or restricting the game's dimensions in the options menu.
